components.name: Layout
components.description: Main layout wrapper with RTL support for Hebrew language, including header, footer, and metadata configuration

components.name: Header
components.description: RTL-optimized header with logo, navigation menu, and booking CTA button

components.name: HeroSection
components.description: Bold, visually striking hero section with headline, description, and primary CTA

components.name: AboutSection
components.description: Section highlighting the café's experience, expertise and unique value proposition

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Showcase of the café's key services and offerings with visual elements

components.name: BookingSection
components.description: Interactive booking form with RTL support and validation

components.name: GallerySection
components.description: Visual showcase of the café's ambiance, food, and drinks

components.name: LocationSection
components.description: Map and contact information section with business hours

components.name: CTASection
components.description: Final call-to-action section to drive bookings

components.name: Footer
components.description: RTL-optimized footer with navigation, contact info, and social links

components.name: MenuPage
components.description: Dedicated page showcasing the café's menu offerings

components.name: BookingPage
components.description: Dedicated booking page with extended form functionality

components.name: ContactPage
components.description: Dedicated contact page with form and expanded contact information

components.name: Button
components.description: Reusable button component with variants and RTL support

components.name: Card
components.description: Reusable card component for displaying content blocks

components.name: SectionHeader
components.description: Reusable section header with title, subtitle, and decorative elements
